Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS

Title: Relates to establishing ground rent rebates for eligible homeowners and renters in the Battery Park project area
Summary: Relates to establishing ground rent rebates for eligible homeowners and renters in the Battery Park project area; provides for a rebate program; provides for a process for application and certification.
LawCode: Amd ยง1974-b, Pub Auth L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public authorities law, in relation to establishing ground rent rebates for eligible homeowners and renters in the Battery Park project area
